caption:
"A possibly fabric-covered lampshade with off-white coloring and cylindrical shape. Features horizontal black bands around its body. Likely designed for diffusing light. Positioned next to a wall-mounted electrical box in an indoor setting."

"A metallic tool-type object, matte silver with angular grooves. Inconclusive evidence for its exact function, but it may be used for gripping or prying. Seen on a bed with bedding materials nearby."
